This exceptional item is valued at $150 by me due to its unique features and high-quality materials. Considering its unparalleled benefits and the satisfaction it promises, I believe this is an opportunity not to be missed. I kindly invite you to accept this offer and experience the excellence firsthand. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer
